root.name: FaceBreaker
root.description: OverviewFaceBreaker is a boxing title that was developed by EA Canada and published under the EA Sports Freestyle label. More cartoonish and far less serious than EA's Fight Night series, the game was released on the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3, along with FaceBreaker: K.O. Party on the Wii.CharactersBrickIceKekoaKirikoMolotovRomeoSocksSparrowSpinSteveTikiVoodooSoundtrackFacebreaker features the usual list of licensed EA tracks, mostly hip hop and guitar-heavy rock.Boys Noize - Arcade RobotBoys Noize - Oh!Dropkick Murphys - The Warrior’s CodeFort Knox Five feat.
